title: DJ Sona doesnt share her music
body:
So, anytime I see DJ Sona on my team in a game, I get really let down, because there's no way for me to listen in on her remixed music. Can you please fix this. Its been weeks, and I've reported before, as I'm sure many also have.

I'm not sure if its because I also own DJ Sona, but it's getting really frustrating. I spent alot of money on a skin that doesn't even work to its full advertised working status. If you could fix this, I would much appreciate it. Thanks Guys!

replies.body: I've had a few friends have that bug where they can't see the button next to Sona's portrait when they press tab, even tried going into a custom with them as Sona and they still couldn't see the button.
If you've checked out [this link](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0AQTKJI1-how-to-opting-in-to-dj-sonas-music) and are still having issues, please reach out!
you have to press tab and then an icon appears next to her champ portrait
I understand that pressing TAB for most people will reveal the "Play" Button, but I've never seen it. Not once.
